lessons.japanese: 一日せっせと働いた後は静かに休んでいたいんだよ。
lessons.english: I want to be quiet after a day's hard work.

lessons.japanese: アリは夏じゅうせっせとはたらく。
シスコさんはアリのようにせっせと働きますね。
あなたは宿題をせっせとやりさえすればよい。
lessons.english: You have only to work away at your homework.

lessons.japanese: 母は台所でせっせと料理しながら歌を口ずさんでいた。
lessons.english: Mother hummed to herself as she went about her cooking in the kitchen.

lessons.japanese: 母は台所でせっせと料理しながら歌を口ずさんでいた。
lessons.english: My mother hummed to herself as she went about her cooking in the kitchen.

lessons.japanese: 動物達はせっせと木の実を集めていた。
lessons.english: The animals were busy collecting nuts.

lessons.japanese: 朝早く起きてせっせと働きたくない。
lessons.english: Don't wanna get up early to work hard.
